about_the_game:
Experience the ultimate VR bow shooter, oVRshot! Immerse yourself in thrilling archery-based combat in multiple game modes. Choose from a variety of special abilities, adding depth and strategy to your gameplay.

Customize your character with a wide range of cosmetics, unlocking epic skins and visual upgrades. With a fully featured cosmetic system that everyone can enjoy, you'll be able to create your perfect avatar!

Engage in competitive multiplayer battles or vibe out in casual lobbies. oVRshot delivers an immersive and action-packed VR experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Get ready to wield your bow and become a legend in Stryker!

Join our discord community:



Features
  • 3 vs 3 multiplayer action
  • Intensely fast-paced matches
  • Solo/coop vs AI
  • Awesome bow physics
  • Choice between 3 locomotion systems
  • Unique Abilities
  • Steam friends integration
  • Crossplay
  • In game voice chat
  • Upcoming Cosmetic System
  • Grapples, Double jumps, and Fast movement
detailed_description:
Experience the ultimate VR bow shooter, oVRshot! Immerse yourself in thrilling archery-based combat in multiple game modes. Choose from a variety of special abilities, adding depth and strategy to your gameplay.

Customize your character with a wide range of cosmetics, unlocking epic skins and visual upgrades. With a fully featured cosmetic system that everyone can enjoy, you'll be able to create your perfect avatar!

Engage in competitive multiplayer battles or vibe out in casual lobbies. oVRshot delivers an immersive and action-packed VR experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Get ready to wield your bow and become a legend in Stryker!

name: oVRshot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970/RX 570 or equivalent at 2x MSAA
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4670 / AMD R5-1400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / GTX 980 Ti / Vega 56 or equivalent at 8x MSAA
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required

reviews:
“I’m honestly not sure why more games like oVRshot haven’t made their way to market yet”
Upload VR

“oVRShot offers a polished VR FPS experience”
VR THE GAMERS
short_description: Engage in epic battles! Choose unique special abilities, and dominate the competition. Customize your character with awesome cosmetics. Experience the ultimate VR archery game oVRshot now!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Norwegian, Korean
*languages with full audio support
